column2: Taking a break from hard work
What is the meaning of life?
This ruler feels aroused a lot.
Had the best meal in ages
Fighting for or has fought for independence
Shared worries with a fellow parent

column2: The conquest of Persia and Babylon was only the beginning - the Seljuks are ready and eager to conquer new lands in the Levant and Anatolia!

column2: This ruler was adopted into his or her dynasty. While legally their status as a family member is not necessarily in doubt, many do not view them as a rightful ruler.
This character is trying hard to conceive a child.
This ruler accepts those who, while having the same religion as him or her, believe in or practice slightly different things which others may not necessarily like.
Memories of an innocent, first love are currently haunting this character
This patrician recently received some useful information from an old friend, and is using it to secure a number of profitable business deals
This ruler was gullible enough to fall for a scam.
This character recently participated in a meditation retreat at a local Buddhist temple, where he or she engaged in various spiritual and meditative practices.
A comet was sighted in this ruler's realm, decreasing the stability and sanity of its people. Surely a sign of the end of days!
Recently several unusual phenomena happening in this ruler's realm have been interpreted as good omens.

The end of the Macedonian dynasty, founded by the illustrious and brilliant Basil II, has left the empire in a troubled state. The military is in disarray, the treasury is greatly reduced, and the empire's borders are threatened by enemies on all sides.
This character is willing to consider others' suggestions and opinions, even if they criticize him or her.
This ruler is of descent from the Prophet's family, and as such is highly regarded by their Shiite vassals and soldiers.
One of this merchant's business associates was recently convicted of fraud.
Bizarre events have occurred in this province, events that may have affected the population negatively.
A mysterious conman visited the area selling fake charms. But then again, were they actually real to begin with?
This ruler just keeps going, and going, and going, and going, and going, and...
This character can't keep up when it comes to lovemaking.
This character uses bizarre-looking head tilts in order to emphasize their words and arguments. Strangely, it works.
Just... need... to brush my teeth... one more time...
But if I know you, I know what you'll do\nYou'll love me at once, the way you did once upon a dream

The faithful in this province approve of this ruler's marriage to his or her sibling. Their wise and just union has, so it said, frightened the demons and brought nothing but good fortune and prosperity to this province!
It just happens that I'm right and you're wrong, but I don't feel any ill-will or hatred towards you because of it.
Local Cook Made Huge Falafel Balls
Those balls look so big and round!
Hummus is a very delicious and nutrituous food dip made from cooked, mashed chickpeas usually blended with tahini, olive oil, lemon juice, salt and garlic.
I'm suddenly not feeling that well...
You're insane! You're completely insane! You're like a unicorn - who in the world would ever hate hummus?
This province is known for the quality of its hummus. Travelers everywhere come here to enjoy the soul of hummus!
The people in this province are encouraged by their ruler to understand the benefits of marriage between close kin. Any condemnation of such practices would be punished severely!

To marry one's sibling, parent, or child is a great deed! This character has recently reflected on the immeasurable benefits of such a union, and is quite encouraged. Who wouldn't want to uphold justice and truth, bring peace to the world, and destroy evil, after all?
Isn't my child so cute? Oh my goodness! So cute!
This character is not easily swayed by blind faith or ideology. They understand that sometimes, you just have to be practical.
There is clear evidence that this character's divine marriage with one of their close kin has successfully killed and exorcised evil spirits and encouraged spiritual peace and harmony around them.
This character is obsessed with incest. It's rather disturbing for various reasons.
Suffering from Parents' Sin of Incest
People have compared this character to the legendary knight of Camelot, Sir Lancelot
People have compared this character to the legendary knight of Camelot, Sir Perceval
People have compared this character to the legendary knight of Camelot, Sir Gawain
People have compared this character to the legendary knight of Camelot, Sir Galahad
People have compared this character to the legendary traitor from Arthurian legend, Sir Mordred
This character possesses a very powerful sword said to have supernatural powers. Could it be the legendary sword of King Arthur?
Dammit, will you just stop with it already!
Drink enough of these potions, and you will have the abilities to transcend and bend reality itself!
A volcano recently erupted in this province, causing much damage. It will take years for the locals to rebuild.
This province happened to be near a volcanic eruption. Though it did not suffer any immediate damage, the resulting clouds of smoke spread here, affecting the productivity of the land.
This province's lord is currently hosting a normal Sogdian fair. People from all across the Silk Road are gathering here to trade and have fun!

This province's lord is currently hosting a Fair of Max. People from all across the Silk Road are gathering here to trade and have fun, as well as engage each other in an atmosphere of religious tolerance and interaction!

This province's lord is currently hosting a Tirmah Fair. People from all across the Silk Road are gathering here to trade and have fun! They must beware, though, for defective goods can be sold at the Tirmah Fair without penalty!

This province's lord is currently hosting a Mxyrh Fair. People from all across the Silk Road are gathering here to trade and have fun! They must beware, though, for at this fair, there is a fun tradition where one's belongings can be "stolen" by friends and family!
I just love this texture, it feels so... silky...
Made in China, of high quality
Incense is like smoke to some, perfume of the heavens to others.
If music be the food of love, play on!
Tricked someone at the Tirmah Fair
Chose Not to Purchase Something at the Fair
Apparently this person prefers window shopping
Never have there been such horses of such ability and strength!
Can I have a taste of your melons?
Wine is the drink of true men and women.
Unstylish, coarse, and barbaric - but very practical. Only cowards and pansies wear silk - real men wear haircloth!
Don't worry, usually it's already dead by the time you put it in your mouth. Usually.
Jewels are a noble's best friend.
Made from dead elephants, carved by master craftsmen.
Comfortable, these rugs have many different uses: for decoration, for a sleeping surface, for sweeping dirt under, for tumbling on, etc.
A special plant known to the Chinese as "Baicao," or "white grass," that originates from certain regions of the steppes - it is poisonous and deadly!
This character dared to eat beef, or so the rumors say! If true, this is very bad karma indeed!
Kebabs are wonderful! More kebabs! Bring them here!
This character hates Kebabs, and detests how they are invading Indian cuisine.
This character possesses a beautiful, unique rock.

There are stories about how the mines in this province have recently been infested with Kobolds, goblin-like creatures. According to some, that would explain the frequent problems the mines here have been facing.
This ruler has napkins from Persia that are fire-proof. They are coated with abestos (said to come from fire-breathing salamanders) which gives them this special property.
This character has to remember that popping their pimples isn't a good idea.
Ho ho ho! A holy man is said to travel around these parts, giving gifts to children and the needy and spreading good cheer.
Candy is a good source of sugar, which most people don't get enough of these days.
This character possesses a beautiful nutcracker, made of exquisite wood and crafted by expert craftsmen.
The craftsmen of [VIET_toymaker_province.GetName] are known for their beautifully-made toys.
This child has some wonderful toys. What a lucky kid!
The rulers of [VIET_toymaker_province.GetName] have given the local toymakers some financial support.
What a grinch! This character refused to support the local toymaking industry. Surely children all over the world do not like such a horrible, horrible person.
Some toys are so beautiful that they're better used as household decorations, to show lowly commoners just how powerful and wealthy you are.
This character has connections with the world-famous toymakers of [VIET_toymaker_province.GetName].
Due to recent economic developments, the world-famous toymakers of [VIET_toymaker_province.GetName] are accruing more profits than usual!
A bit of exercise does wonders.
This character owns a most fascinating chicken. Its previous owner, a farmer, tried beheading it, but only partly succeeded. The chicken still lives, for now, despite not having a head!
Conmen and charlatans beware! This character, whether through their vast knowledge or their keen senses, can detect a hoax from miles away.
A sudden surge in wolf attacks has led to the disruption of the herding industry.
The population of fish in the waters surrounding this province have increased significantly - more fish for everyone!
Lipbalm made using human earwax. It's surprisingly effective!
I'm Curious! I'm Curious! I'm Curious!
This character has a known weakness to attractive young maids...
How punny! This character enjoys making puns.
This character owns a quality abacus.
This character smells and looks really nice.
This lord has a thing for pretty young maids...
This character has proven that he or she is not business-friendly.
This province is known for the quality of its courtersans and houses of ill repute. At the least, it helps stimulate the economy.
There have been a number of disputes between peasants and merchants in this province, leading to violence and other disruptions to civil order. The authorities are trying to placate both sides.
This character has... odd preferences, to put it lightly.

In one of this province's villages, two siblings lusted after one another. They ran away so they could marry elsewhere, where no one would know them. Nevertheless, this turn of events has left many locals feeling enraged and fearful of divine retribution.
This province recently suffered from a major landslide, leading to the deaths of many and the widespread destruction of property.
The young men of this province have achieved some level of renown for their bravery and skill in war.
This character has heard that great song, Scarborough Fair, and he or she has been enlightened by it. Onwards, as they say, to Scarborough Fair!
